title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
author: Maria Rossi
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat a large pan over medium heat. Add pancetta and cook until crispy (5-7 minutes).
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining the spaghetti.
Add drained spaghetti to the pan with pancetta (remove from heat).
Quickly pour the egg mixture over the hot pasta, tossing continuously to create a creamy sauce.
Add reserved pasta water as needed to achieve desired consistency.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
author: Raj Patel
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, and 1 tsp each of turmeric, cumin, and coriander powder for at least 2 hours.
Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F). Thread chicken onto skewers and bake for 15-20 minutes until slightly charred.
Heat oil in a large pan. Sauté onions until golden brown.
Add remaining spices and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes until oil separates.
Add cream and butter, stirring continuously.
Add grilled chicken pieces and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh and healthy salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
author: Sophia Kostas
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and bell pepper in a large bowl.
Add olives and gently toss.
Arrange feta cheese on top of the vegetables.
Whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle dressing over the salad.
Garnish with fresh oregano leaves and serve immediately.
